title: Fixing Patching loop
body: I currently found a fix, don't know if will work for everybody, but here it is. [Link to the video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S1P-GFdtSJ4&feature=youtu.be)

replies.body:
Ayyyyy that's a weird fix for sure xD! Glad it's been able to help, and if ya don't mind I'm going to be testing this with others as well!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
HAHA this fixed it for me, but all I did was sync my internet time!  Love you.
